ch0122_00_yo/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go
explore Pasio again today!
ch0122_00_yo/0101_0701_02_10:
I think it’ll be a blast to explore the unknown
together with you! I’m looking forward to it!
ch0122_00_yo/7101_0701_01_10:
If you say Alola to someone, they’ll say it right
back to you!
ch0122_00_yo/7101_0701_02_10:
Even the other Trainers here on Pasio started doing
that! I’m glad everyone’s so open to new things!
ch0122_00_yo/7101_0701_03_10:
If you didn’t know, “Alola” means “Hello” or
“How’s it going?”
ch0122_00_yo/7102_0701_01_10:
The more I travel around Pasio, the more friends
I make!
ch0122_00_yo/7102_0701_02_10:
I’ve been talking to Lillie and the others about all
the cool friends we’ve made here!
ch0122_00_yo/7102_0701_04_10:
We talk about how amazing it is that you’re
friends with so many people!
ch0122_00_yo/7103_0701_01_10:
Do you know about the island challenge? It’s
something we do in Alola, and it’s kind of like a
rite of passage.
ch0122_00_yo/7103_0701_02_10:
There are four islands we go to, and each one has
some trials to overcome. You have to grow
stronger as a person in order to complete them!
ch0122_00_yo/7103_0701_03_10:
It’s pretty tough, but we make lots of lifelong
memories by going through it.
ch0122_00_yo/7104_0701_01_10:
I can’t believe the Elite Four and Gym Leaders
from Kanto are here on Pasio! It’s so exciting!
ch0122_00_yo/7104_0701_02_10:
They’re all people I really admired before I
moved to Alola.
ch0122_00_yo/7104_0701_03_10:
It’s so exciting how on Pasio, you can go exploring
with them and even battle together!
ch0122_00_yo/7105_0701_01_10:
You should come visit me in Alola sometime,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0122_00_yo/7105_0701_02_10:
I’d be happy to show you around all sorts of fun
places there!
ch0122_00_yo/7105_0701_03_10: I really wanna show you all my favorite spots!
ch0122_00_yo/1701_0701_01_10: Alola! Got a present for you!
ch0122_00_yo/1701_0702_01_10:
Go ahead and use it all up...as long as you use
it wisely!
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0701_01_10:
Once, Lillie got involved in a really sticky situation
back in Alola.
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0701_02_10:
My friends and I did our best to help her out, but
sometimes we ended up doing stuff that got
pretty stressful.
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0701_03_10:
And when that happened, even though Lillie was
the one we were trying to help, she got really
worried about us!
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0701_04_10:
She’s such a good friend. I’m so glad I was able
to help her out.
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’re ever in trouble, let me know! I’d be
more than happy to help you, too!
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0702_02_10:
I don’t wanna be the kind of guy who just leaves
a friend alone when they’re in trouble.
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0702_03_10: Of course, I’ll make sure not to overdo it!
ch0122_00_yo/2501_0702_04_10:
It’s important to be there for the people you
care about.
ch0122_00_yo/2511_0701_01_10:
I learned the importance of a lot of things back in
Alola. The strength of friendship, being kind,
having fun...
ch0122_00_yo/2511_0701_02_10:
And also, I learned how important it is to be
brave enough to stand up to any obstacle.
ch0122_00_yo/2511_0701_03_10:
That’s why I think the island challenge was
something that helped me grow up a little.
At least, I hope I did!
ch0122_00_yo/2511_0701_04_10:
Or rather, maybe I should say...we all got
stronger together, huh?
ch0122_00_yo/2511_0702_01_10:
Y’know, I have a special photo of me and my
friend from when we first set out on the
island challenge.
ch0122_00_yo/2511_0702_02_10:
One of these days, I’ll bring it to show you how
much we’ve grown since then!
ch0122_00_yo/3001_0701_01_10:
When I take a big, deep breath of clean air,
I almost feel like a brand-new person afterward!
ch0122_00_yo/3003_0701_01_10:
There are so many fun things to do on Pasio, huh?
If I came here for a vacation tour, I might never
wanna leave!
ch0122_00_yo/3005_0701_01_10:
When the sun goes down, sometimes you get to
see a different side of your friends and Pokémon.
It’s what makes exploring at night so much fun!
